artist: Artist: Troy Swain; Publisher: Troy Swain , New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of a line of figures (along the spine), with designs and text, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 28 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Random Comics
